long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy Reference (Beta) is an App to help students and researchers writing essays, dissertations, papers, etc. It cross references a document's in-text reference citations with the reference list, at then end. It makes it quick and easy to update the list based on missing references:

	• Supports Microsoft Word™ .docx files
	• View a list of missing citations and references and where they are used
	• Click to lookup references on Google Scholar

This App is in Beta, try it out and provide feedback.
